text: Brigitte Catillon (born 20 July 1951) is a French actress and screenwriter. She was nominated for the César Award for Best Supporting Actress in 1993 for A Heart in Winter directed by Claude Sautet. She was also nominated for the Molière Award for actress in a supporting role in 2007 for the piece EVA of Nicolas Bedos, and in 2011 for the piece Nono of Sacha Guitry, directed by Michel Fau. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" | |- !
